name: musclesworked
description: Exercise-to-muscle mapping MCP server. 856 exercises, 65 muscles, 14 muscle groups with primary/secondary/stabilizer activation data. Analyze workouts, find alternatives, discover gaps.

tools.name: get_muscles_worked
tools.description: Get primary, secondary, and stabilizer muscles for an exercise

tools.name: find_exercises
tools.description: Find exercises targeting a specific muscle with optional filters

tools.name: analyze_workout
tools.description: Analyze a workout for muscle coverage, gaps, and push/pull imbalances

tools.name: get_alternatives
tools.description: Find alternative exercises ranked by muscle overlap score
